definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Local people like to chew it, especially at a wedding.
sentences.chinese: 本地人喜欢嚼槟榔，尤其在婚礼上。

sentences.english: The suspect, Gong Runbo, 33, grew up in the town.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪嫌疑人宫润伯现年33岁，本地人。

sentences.english: Here the local were always barbered at this hour on this day.
sentences.chinese: 原来本地人老是在这一天这个时候这个地方理发。

sentences.english: The traditional view is that "Bizika" means "native people" in Tujia dialect.
sentences.chinese: 最传统的说法是“毕兹卡”是“本地人”的意思。

sentences.english: Have the effortless thou this natural of the location, make Mo to namely don't worry money problem.
sentences.chinese: 有古易这个本地人，弄墨到是不担心钱财问题。

sentences.english: Shanghai natives Tom Lu, left, and Bao Chen have been together for more than one year.
sentences.chinese: 上海本地人陆康华和鲍琛在一起有一年多了。

sentences.english: In short local Hong Kong people are sneaky VERY sneaky.
sentences.chinese: 简而言之，香港本地人很狡猾。

sentences.english: The same law applies to the native-born and to the alien living among you.
sentences.chinese: 本地人和寄居在你们中间的外人同归一例。

sentences.english: Once, locals took to wearing masks on the backs of their heads to discourage attacks.
sentences.chinese: 以前，本地人会在头后面戴上面具以吓退老虎。

sentences.english: He's a California native and was born in Burbank.
sentences.chinese: 他是加州的本地人，出生于伯班克。

sentences.english: The Izakaya is a strange noun for local people.
sentences.chinese: 居酒屋对于本地人来说，可说是相当陌生的一个名词。

sentences.english: This will help solve the problem of, for instance, where in Shanghai non-Shanghai natives can live.
sentences.chinese: 比如对在上海的本地人和非本地人共同居住的问题。

sentences.english: This will help solve the problem of, for instance, where in Shanghai non-Shanghai natives can live.
sentences.chinese: 比如对在上海的本地人和非本地人共同居住的问题。

sentences.english: Visitors and locals alike meander along the sidewalks of the Seine River.
sentences.chinese: 观光客和本地人都会沿着塞纳河的河滨步道漫步。

sentences.english: Native Houstonian and still live here…
sentences.chinese: 休斯敦本地人，而且一直住在这里。

sentences.english: Locals simply love their Chicken Cheese Pie.
sentences.chinese: 本地人最喜欢吃他们的机肉起司派。

definition: parts of the country other than where one is
another part of the country/some other place
fellow townsman/fellow villager/sb from the same hometown
Beijing resident/Peking ape-man, Homo erectus pekinensis (c. 600,000 BC), discovered in 1921 at Zhoukoudian 周口店[Zhou1 kou3 dian4], Beijing
dragged down by having a family to feed
